title: Egypt Frees One Al-Jazeera Journalist From Prison
teaser: Al-Jazeera journalist Peter Greste will be deported to Australia. He is one of three Al-Jazeera journalists who were arrested in December 2013. NPR's Rachel Martin talks to Leila Fadel in Cairo.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
